starting_event.Description: A new day dawns for the nation, it's history beginning.

industrialization.Description: The nation's most productive members work together to bring about a new age. An age of machines. An industrial revolution.

bad_event1.Description: The country gets off to a rocky start when the founding fathers make off with the nation's finances.

bad_event2.Description: Things quickly spiral out of control as the temporary governor decides to take power for life.

bad_event3.Description: A massive famine engulfed the country, many died from starvation while the country's rulers fought for control.

bad_event4.Description: A new plague spreads throughout the land, and the people die by the thousands.

bad_event5.Description: A devastating war with a neighbouring country leaves the country's cities burning and its leaders shamed.

bad_event6.Description: The national animal goes extinct. Nobody seems to care.

bad_event7.Description: An 'environmental disaster' kills all plant life in the country.

good_event1.Description: A proud day begins for the nation as the declaration of independence is signed. All of the country's leaders are in attendance.

good_event2.Description: A bountiful harvest leaves none starving, and a new holiday is christened celebrating the new nation.

good_event3.Description: Prosperity flows as citizens move from farms to cities. People who once didn't have jobs quickly find employment.

good_event4.Description: The world is engulfed in a worldwide conflict. The country ends up on the winning side, and gains much new territory.

good_event5.Description: The nation becomes one of the first to host international games within its borders. A new age of peace seems inevitable.

good_event6.Description: Immigrants flood to the country, taking jobs that nobody else would work. People still complain.

good_event7.Description: The country successfully lands a man on the moon. They also bring him home safely.
